convienence function for generating example bed glyphs

convienence function for generating example bed glyphs

bed_glyph(x, y = NULL, .fun, ..., x_name = "X", y_name = "Y",
  start_col = "start", end_col = "end", title_ops = "(x, y)")

Arguments

x
tbl of intervals passed to .fun
y
optional tbl of intervals to pass to .fun (default = FALSE)
.fun
valr function to execute on (x and/or y intervals)
...
other arguments to pass to .fun (x ivls and y ivls passed by default if supplied)
x_name
name of plotted x intervals (default is "X")
y_name
name of plotted y intervals (default is "Y")
start_col
name of column containing start positions to use for plotting results (default = "start")
end_col
name of columm containing end positions to use for plotting results (default = "end")
title_ops
options to pass to title display in ggplot object (default = "(x, y"))

Value

ggplot2_obj

Built by pkgdown. Styled with Bootstrap 3.
